blogs.title: Building Scalable Web Apps with React and Node.js
blogs.excerpt: Exploring how to create high-performance web applications using React and Node.js, with tips on scalability and best practices.
blogs.content: React and Node.js form a powerful combo for building fast, modular, and maintainable web apps. Key steps include project setup with Vite and Express, RESTful API design, state management with Redux Toolkit or React Context, scalability with load balancing and Redis caching, and deployment with Docker and AWS.

blogs.title: My Journey into Rust: Why It‚Äôs My New Favorite Language
blogs.excerpt: A personal take on learning Rust, its benefits for systems programming, and why it‚Äôs worth the steep learning curve.
blogs.content: Rust‚Äôs focus on safety and performance makes it ideal for systems programming. It offers memory safety via its ownership model, performance comparable to C++, and a friendly community with great documentation. Tips for beginners include reading *The Rust Book* and starting with small CLI tools.

blogs.title: Balancing Work and Life as a Developer
blogs.excerpt: Being a developer is rewarding but intense. Here‚Äôs how I maintain work-life balance with mindful strategies.
blogs.content: Balancing work and life involves time blocking with Notion, taking short breaks every 90 minutes, and using Pomodoro timers. Challenges include avoiding burnout during deadlines. Practical tips include scheduling screen-free hours and talking to peers about stress.

faqs.question: What services does Aayush offer?
faqs.answer: Aayush offers full-stack web development, AI-powered solutions, chatbot development, cloud architecture design, and mobile app development. He specializes in React.js, Node.js, Rust, Docker, PostgreSQL, and more.

faqs.question: How can I contact Aayush for a project?
faqs.answer: You can reach Aayush via the Contact section on his website or email him at aayush@example.com.

faqs.question: What is Aayush‚Äôs experience with AI?
faqs.answer: Aayush has developed AI-powered solutions like the FlowHive CRM (with lead management and email assistant) and an AI-powered marketing website with a custom chatbot, plus a loyalty-based discount chatbot with 99% transaction accuracy.

faqs.question: Can Aayush build a custom chatbot for my business?
faqs.answer: Yes, Aayush can build custom chatbots tailored to your business needs, using technologies like JavaScript, Rust, or no-code platforms. See his TheLoyalGame Chatbot project for an example.

faqs.question: What is Aayush‚Äôs educational background?
faqs.answer: Aayush holds a B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering from Swami Keshvanand Institute of Technology, Jaipur, with a CGPA of 9.01 (Top 5%), completed in June 2024.

faqs.question: Where can I read Aayush‚Äôs blog posts?
faqs.answer: Aayush‚Äôs blog posts are available on his website under the Blog section. Topics include scalable web apps, Rust programming, and work-life balance.

faqs.question: What technologies does Aayush specialize in?
faqs.answer: Aayush specializes in React.js, Node.js, Rust, WebAssembly, Docker, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Spring Boot, Redis, and AWS, among others.

general.about: Aayush Sharma is a software engineer and full-stack developer with expertise in web development, AI, and cloud solutions. He graduated with a B.Tech in Computer Science (CGPA: 9.01) and has worked on projects like AI-powered CRMs, chatbots, and scalable web apps.
